content:
{"name": "ai_explorer_post", "type": "document", "content": "**🔥 The Job Market Has Changed Forever – Here’s Proof 🔥**

The **hiring model we’ve followed for decades is dead.**  
Experience. Skills. Education. **None of it is enough anymore.**  

Companies **think they’re hiring for the future, but they’re hiring based on the past.**  
The reality? **AI is no longer just a tool—it’s an employee.**  

The **new hiring model** isn’t "do you have experience?" It’s **"how well can you implement AI?"**  
Businesses don’t need **more employees.** They need **fewer employees who can harness AI to do 10x the work.**  

So I’m testing it. **Right now.**  

I just applied for **[Job Title]** at **[Company]** using an AI-powered approach:  
✅ **AI-Augmented Resume** – Not just experience, but how AI eliminates inefficiencies.  
✅ **AI-Powered Cover Letter** – Focused on transformation, not history.  
✅ **Automation Roadmap for the Role** – How AI can reduce the need for this job in 6 months or less.  

**This isn’t a personal experiment anymore—it’s a movement.**  

🚀 **If you’re frustrated with your job search, curious about AI, and ready to try a new path, this is your moment.**  
Drop a comment **saying “I’m in,”** repost this, and DM me your email.  

**I’ll reach out in the next few days with details. The response will help AI determine what happens next.**  

🚀 **Holy sh*t, this is moving fast. Welcome to the new world.**"}
